comments.body: For future consideration: Maybe it's better for the `unapply`s to take a less specific type to avoid such warnings.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@11 |     case extractors.InlinedLambda(_, Select(_, name)) => Expr(name) // error // error
   |                                      ^
   |                                      the type test for q1.reflect.Select cannot be checked at runtime
